column4: Hey guys, im running ubuntu 9.10 and have vlc, is there a repo i should add or packages (codecs) to make sure vlc will play most anything i through at it?
happy,well havent played around with it in ages, just got back to ubunut ;)
there is a how to on the forums on how to install the codecs here: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=766683&highlight=Direct+Rendering
I installed them and I havent had any problems up to now!
